1.1. src package

1.1.1. Submodules

1.1.2. src.order module

class src.order.Order

Bases: object

The order object which contains all pizza objects for a given order, the associated cost, as well as some useful methods.

input_pizza(crust: str = 'thin', sauce: str | List = 'marinara', cheese: str | None = None, toppings: str | List = ['pepperoni']) → None

Adds a pizza to the order with the desired toppings and updates the total cost.

Parameters:

  • crust (str) – The type of pizza crust (thin, thick, gluten free). Must pick one.

  • sauce (Union[str, List]) – The type of pizza sauce (marinara, pesto, liv sauce). Must pick one to multiple.

  • cheese (Union[str, None]) – The type of pizza cheese (mozzarela, None). Can pick up to one.

  • toppings (Union[str, List]) – The type of pizza toppings (pineapple, pepperoni, mushrooms). Must pick one to multiple.

order_paid() → None

Changes the status of the order to “paid”

1.1.3. src.pizza module

class src.pizza.Pizza(crust: str = 'thin', sauce: str | List = 'marinara', cheese: str | None = None, toppings: str | List = ['pepperoni'])

Bases: object

The pizza object which contains all the ingredients and the associated cost, as well as some useful methods.

cost() → int

Gets the cost of the pizza.

Returns:

The cost of the pizza in dollars

Return type:

int
